scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "blue,green" "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"

comments.sharedDeps: These dependencies are shared across frontend/backend via npm workspaces:
comments.better-sqlite3: Used by backend routes and root scripts (generate-static-json.js)
comments.sharp: Used by backend routes (avatar/favicon generation) and root scripts (generate-favicons.js)
comments.openai: Used by backend routes (AI titles) and root scripts (auto-translate.js)
comments.dotenv: Used by backend and root scripts for .env file loading
comments.@types/node: Shared TypeScript types for Node.js across all packages
